title: China's star Wang Yuan advocates for child-friendly education at the UN
text:
China's star Wang Yuan advocates for child-friendly education at the UN 5:44pm IST - 01:30 
Chinese boy band singer and actor Wang Yuan uses his voice to support the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development. Rough Cut (No reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
